channel.title: Unzip Items.dmk Help? Help opening files, unsure on filetype :S
channel.description:
Well i've just unzipped the items.dmk file in the demonik client folder, and i cant seem to be able to read the file, unsure on the filetype :S and im unable to read the files hex color! Anyone idea what i can use to open this file? Thanks

item.title: Unzip Items.dmk Help? Help opening files, unsure on filetype :S
item.dc:creator: @dumm1s dumm1s
item.description:
@dumm1s wrote:

dude tbh, this is a community to share & imrove pieces of code, thats why its called “development”
its not to request help on everything you stumble upon, ive seen like 4 threads by you, every single one ur asking for help.

learn java, try stuff your self, and LEARN along the way.

by requesting help with everything, how will you be able to learn?
and how will you be able to run a server?

OT: use renes sprite editor to get the sprites .img and .spr and code urself an spritepacker, cuz no1 will give you.

Read full topic
